name: Tiny Tank (itch) (Jay)
description:
Take control of a rogue tank and destroy anything in your path. Either plow through your obstacles, or spam missiles to make them a thing of the past.

Controls:

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

*Disclaimer* 

This is my first game ever made and published publically. There will be bugs and some physics glitches, as the main goal of this game was to expand my knowledge and start my dive into Unity.
